hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "A mount is not saddled (for a journey) except to three Masajid: Al-Masjid Al-Haram, this Masjid of mine, and Masjid Al-Aqsa." [Abu `Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي أَىِّ الْمَسَاجِدِ أَفْضَلُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Which Of The Masajid Are More Virtuous
